column2: The steppe seems too dangerous with all the other hordes to the Soitoskan people. You could search for a new home in Iran.
The Soitoskan people can't stay on the steppe for too long. You can settle in the lands of Khorasan and abandon your old home.
The Soitoskan people have migrated to Khorasan.

Now that you have lead the Soitoskan people to Khorasan, some of them started to embrace the local customs. It could be safer for both you and your people to convert to one of the local religions yourself.
I shall embrace the teachings of Allah!
I should see my other options.
Go back to the previous options.
Your people will move to Khorasan.
Most of your people will convert with you.
Some of your people will convert to a local religion.
